text: Francisco Sobrino (1932 - 11 May 2014) was a Spanish sculptor from Guadalajara, Spain. His career began in 1959 when he moved to Paris to have a start in his career. His works can be seen in Tel Aviv, Guadalajara, Chicago, Madrid, New York City, and Paris. Sobrino was born in Guadalajara, Mexico, but was raised in Madrid, Spain. Sobrino died in Paris, France, aged 82. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Spanish sculptors Category:20th-century artists Category:21st-century artists
title: Francisco Sobrino
